docs.snippet: Thirty-seven nations scattered all over the world, have formally agreed with Secretary Hull's declaration of July 16 that wars anywhere in the world would have an impact upon the fate of all countries and that therefore treaties must be rigidly...
docs.lead_paragraph: Thirty-seven nations scattered all over the world, have formally agreed with Secretary Hull's declaration of July 16 that wars anywhere in the world would have an impact upon the fate of all countries and that therefore treaties must be rigidly regarded, obligations 'maintained.
docs.abstract: 37 nations voice accord with U S peace plea; Spain, Germany, Japan, China, Italy silent

headline.main: 37 NATIONS RESPOND TO U. S. PEACE PLEA; SPAIN, CHINA SILENT; Germany, Italy and Japan Also Decline to Answer Hull Plan for World Agreement HUNGARY, BULGARIA ANGRY Replies Show Disappointment at Result of World War Pacts--Soviet in Agreement Warring Nations Silent Hungary Attracts Attention 37 NATIONS RESPOND TO U. S. B. M. Hertzog Prime Minister Union of South Africa Statement Made July 16 Urges Strengthened Law

docs.snippet: The first American survivors from the steamship Southern Prince, rammed amidships by a freighter way from Montevideo, Uruguay, to Buenos Aires, Argentina, arrived last night on the Munson liner Southern Cross, which docked at Montague Street,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The first American survivors from the steamship Southern Prince, rammed amidships by a freighter way from Montevideo, Uruguay, to Buenos Aires, Argentina, arrived last night on the Munson liner Southern Cross, which docked at Montague Street, Brooklyn.
docs.abstract: Survivors of July 15th crash with freighter, near Buenos Aires, arrive in N Y C

headline.main: WRECK SURVIVORS HERE; Five Who Were on the Southern Prince Tell of Collision

docs.snippet: Stars from South America took a long lead over the United States in the Pan-American boxing games tonight, scoring eight victories eleven mathches. Three of the visitors moved into the finals along with two United States representatives.
docs.lead_paragraph: Stars from South America took a long lead over the United States in the Pan-American boxing games tonight, scoring eight victories eleven mathches. Three of the visitors moved into the finals along with two United States representatives.
